bibl.title: with contributions by M.L. West, E.G. Turner, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXXII (Nos 2617-2653).

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., with contributions by M.L. West, E.G. Turner, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXXII (Nos 2617-2653). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 46.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1967, 8°, xv-189 pp. et XV pll.

C.R. par Ors. Montevecchi, Aegyptus 48 (1968) pp. 252-256 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXIV et XXXV). - Lloyd W. Daly, AJP 90 (1969) pp. 237-240. - Jean Irigoin, REG 81 (1968) pp. 244-246. - Paul Mertens, BibO 25 (1968) pp. 339-341. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 42 (1967) No. 84, pp. 402-406. - Bruno Snell, Gnomon 40 (1968) pp. 116-123.
